Yossi Dagan Personal Information IT Manager I possess extensive expertise, totaling over 8 years, in systems, networking, +972 52 4446557 cyber security, and integration. My specialization lies in consulting and Providing technological solutions to large organizations. My responsibilities included overseeing the IT system and technological development, as well as leading and managing three teams: helpdesk, integration (system), and information security.
